title: Another Longest Increasing Subsequence Problem
text:
Given a sequence ofNpairs of integers, find the length of thelongest increasing subsequenceof it.Anincreasing sequenceA1..Anis a sequence such that for everyi < j,Ai< Aj.Asubsequenceof a sequence is a sequence that appears in the same relative order, but not necessarily contiguous.A pair of integers(x1, y1)is less than(x2, y2)iffx1< x2andy1< y2.InputThe first line of input contains an integerN(2 ≤N≤ 100000).The followingNlines consist ofNpairs of integers(xi, yi)(-109≤xi, yi≤ 109).OutputThe output contains an integer: the length of the longest increasing subsequence of the given sequence.ExampleInput:8
1 3
3 2
1 1
4 5
6 3
9 9
8 7
7 6Output:3
